name: Monster Cookie Dough
ingredients: 1/4 cup water (slowly add, may need less or more)
Optional: mini chocolate chips and/or M&Ms
instructions: In a bowl, combine oat flour, PB2, vanilla protein powder, sweetener, and a pinch of salt
Slowly add 1/4 cup water, mixing as you go (you may need less or more water)
Mix until cookie dough consistency is reached
Add optional mini chocolate chips and/or M&Ms if desired
Enjoy immediately or refrigerate for firmer texture
